typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ID de caso} as string,
		{Fecha de notificación} as string,
		{Codigo DIVIPOLA} as string,
		{Ciudad de ubicación} as string,
		{Departamento o Distrito } as string,
		{atención} as string,
		Edad as string,
		Sexo as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Estado as string,
		{País de procedencia} as string,
		FIS as string,
		{Fecha de muerte} as string,
		{Fecha diagnostico} as string,
		{Fecha recuperado} as string,
		{fecha reporte web} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mainFile
source(output(
		original as string,
		fixeddepartment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DeptoFiex
mainFile select(mapColumn(
		Estado
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Estado
mainFile select(mapColumn(
		Departamento = {Departamento o Distrito }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Dpto
Estado aggregate(groupBy(Estado),
	unique = count()) ~> Unique
DeptoFiex, Dpto join(original === Departamento,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FixingDept
FixingDept select(mapColumn(
		Departamento = fixeddepartment
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PickFixedDept
Unique keyGenerate(output(surr_estado as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
PickFixedDept aggregate(groupBy(Departamento),
	cuenta = count()) ~> UniqueDept
UniqueDept keyGenerate(output(surr_depto as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyDepto
SelectEdad derive(EdadInt = toInteger(Edad)) ~> EdadEntero
UniqueEdad keyGenerate(output(surr_edad as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyEdad
EdadEntero aggregate(groupBy(EdadInt),
	Count = count()) ~> UniqueEdad
mainFile select(mapColumn(
		Edad
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEdad
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Estado as string,
		surr_estado as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Estado,
		surr_estado
	)) ~> SaveEstadoTb
SurrogateKeyDepto sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Departamento as string,
		surr_depto as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Departamento,
		surr_depto
	)) ~> SaveDepto
SurrogateKeyEdad sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Edad as integer,
		surr_edad as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Edad = EdadInt,
		surr_edad
	)) ~> SaveEdadTb
